name: ControllerBound
description:
ControllerBound is an NES-style puzzle-platformer where some of your controls have been joined together! Made for GMTK Jam 2021!

Please note that while everything says Arrow Keys, there is WASD support.

I'm definitely doing a post-jam level update for this...

Controls*

  • [Left and Right/A and D] - Move
  • [Up and Down/W and S] - Aim shots, grab and climb ladders
  • [Z/J] - Shoot
  • [X/K] - Jump

*These are how the controls are  without being connected to each other. Look at the controller in-game for the controls for the current stage.
